TalentsTiers.Name: Arcane Subtlety
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the chance your helpful Mage spells and damage over time effects will be dispelled by [@value]% and reduces the threat caused by your Arcane spells by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Arcane Focus
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to hit and reduces the mana cost of your Mage Arcane spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Arcane Stability
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting Arcane Missiles and Arcane Blast by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Arcane Fortitude
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your armor by an amount equal to [@value]% of your Intellect.

TalentsTiers.Name: Magic Absorption
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases all resistances by [@value] per level and causes all spells you fully resist to restore [@value2]% of your total mana.  [@value3] sec. cooldown.

TalentsTiers.Name: Arcane Concentration
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives you a [@value2]% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damaging spell hits a target. The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damaging spell by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Magic Attunement
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the range of your Mage Arcane spells by [@value2] yards and the effect of your Amplify Magic and Dampen Magic spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Spell Impact
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage of your Arcane Explosion, Arcane Blast, Blast Wave, Fire Blast, Scorch, Fireball, Ice Lance and Cone of Cold spells by an additional [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Student of the Mind
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your total Spirit by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Focus Magic
TalentsTiers.Description:
5% of base mana
30 yd range

Instant Cast
Increases the target's chance to critically hit with all spells by 3%. When the target critically hits the caster's chance to critically hit with spells is increased by 3% for 10 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Arcane Shielding
TalentsTiers.Description: Decreases the mana lost per point of damage taken when Mana Shield is active by [@value]% and increases the resistances granted by Mage Armor by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Counterspell
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Counterspell also silences the target for [@value] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Arcane Meditation
TalentsTiers.Description: Allows [@value]% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting, and increases spell haste by [@value2]%

TalentsTiers.Name: Torment the Weak
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Frostbolt, Fireball, Frostfire Bolt, Pyroblast, Arcane Missiles, Arcane Blast and Arcane Barrage abilities deal [@value]% more damage to snared or slowedtargets.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Blink
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the mana cost of Blink by [@value]% and for [@value3] sec after casting your chance to be hit by all attacks and spells is reduced by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Presence of Mind
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant
2 min cooldown

When activated, your next Mage spell with a casting time less than 10 sec becomes an instant cast spell.

TalentsTiers.Name: Arcane Mind
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your total Intellect by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Prismatic Cloak
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces all damage taken by [@value]% and reduces the fade time of your invisibility spell by [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Arcane Instability
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your arcane spells and your critical strike chance by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Arcane Potency
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of your next damaging spell by [@value]% after gaining Clearcasting or Presence of Mind.

TalentsTiers.Name: Arcane Empowerment
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage of your Arcane Missiles spell by an amount equal to [@value2]% of your spell power and the damage of your Arcane Blast and Arcane Barrage by [@value3]% of your spell power. In addition increases the damage of all party and raid members within [@value] yards by [@value4]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Arcane Power
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant
2 min cooldown

When activated, your spells deal 20% more damage while costing 20% more mana to cast. This effect lasts 15 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Incanters Absorption
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage absorbed by Mage wards, Mana shield, and Ice Barrier by [@value]/%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Arcane Flows
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Presence of Mind, Arcane Power and Invisibility spells by [@value]%. And the cooldown of your Evocation spell by [@value2] min.

TalentsTiers.Name: Mind Mastery
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases spell power by [@value]% of your total intellect.

TalentsTiers.Name: Slow
TalentsTiers.Description:
10% of base mana
30 yd range

Instant Cast
Reduces target's movement speed by 60%, increases the time between ranged attacks by 60% and increases casting time by 30%. Lasts 15 sec. Slow can only affect one target at a time.

TalentsTiers.Name: Missile Barrage
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives your Arcane Blast, Arcane Barrage, Fireball, Frostbolt and Frostfire Bolt spells a [@value2]% chance to reduce the channeled duration of the next Arcane Missiles spell by [@value] secs and missiles will fire every .[@value3] secs.

TalentsTiers.Name: Netherwind Presence
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your spell haste by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Spell Power
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases critical strike damage bonus of all Mage Arcane spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Arcane Barrage
TalentsTiers.Description:
15% of base mana
30 yd range

Instant Cast
3 sec cooldown

Launches several missiles at the enemy target, causing 936 to 1144 Arcane damage.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks
